item.title: Alias Manager
item.description: Alias Manager is a simple alias manager for Linux shells written in Rust. It provides an easy way to manage aliases, which can be useful for users who frequently change operating systems or need to manage multiple aliases. I wanted to learn Rust thus I created this project. Features Add new aliases with custom commands List existing aliases Remove aliases by name Installation Clone this repository to your local machine: git clone https://github.
